response.original_title: Servando and Florentino: En tu Cuarto
response.overview: DESCRIPTION "In your room: Servando & Florentino Livestream Concert"  An online concert that can be seen all over the world. We have made a concert in:  ⚡Poliedro de Caracas.  ⚡Teresa Carreño Theater.  ⚡National Stadium of Lima Peru.  ⚡Plaza de Acho Peru.  ⚡Roberto Clemente Puerto Rico.  ⚡Teatro de Bellas Artes Puerto Rico.  ⚡Atanacio Girardot Medellín.  ⚡Olympic Stadium Felix Sánchez Dominican Republic.  ⚡Dominican Republic National Theater.  ⚡Madinson Square Garden NY.  And now for the first time the concert will be: IN YOUR ROOM !!  After some time removed from the stage, the First brothers summon a virtual reunion with all their fans around the world. For the first time we will be sharing with all our fans simultaneously and we can relive our best times. We will go through part of our successes with a different, more intimate sound to be able to make it happen IN YOUR ROOM. IN YOUR ROOM you will also hear a special and unique premiere.
response.title: Servando and Florentino in your room
